title: fps drop?
body: i used to be playing at 150 fps the lowest i'd go was mayyybbeee 100 if i was having stuff in background. I get on today and (with the same settings) i run at about 6 fps. what the hell? Is it my wifi? My computer? or the game? (i didn't play at all this update till today)

replies.body: The best way to fix this is to look behind your computer, look for a code saying "service tag" and go to your computer brand website, find drivers, then put in your service tag or express service code and it will give you all the recommended driver updates, go to graphics. and install that

You could be having a driver or hardware issue that's causing your fps to drop.  Wifi can definitely cause issues with lag or input delay, but not necessarily frame skipping.  You can find out for sure by running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of the matches that's happening in.  If you receive no results, I suggest going through our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to tune up your PC.  Hope that helps!
